notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

taskDescription: Research codes of conduct are published by the American Marketing Association, the American Association for Public Opinion Research, the Council of American Survey Research Organizations, and the Marketing Research Association in order to define standards of ethical behavior. List three overlapping areas these organizations have identified as important in regulating the marketing industry.
